trans-unit.source: Use data from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosedEventArgs> method to make decisions about actions to take when a drop-down control closes.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosedEventArgs>做出有關動作的下拉式清單控制項關閉時要採取的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> named `ToolStripDropDown1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>名為`ToolStripDropDown1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor to make decisions about actions to take when a drop-down control closes for the specified reason.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownClosedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>做出有關動作因指定原因的下拉式清單控制項關閉時要採取的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown" /> closed.
The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> named `ToolStripDropDown1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>名為`ToolStripDropDown1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.Closed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
